I am a researcher and hobbyist interested in everything. My focus right now is on computers and cyber security. You can check out some of the work I’ve done on this very site.

IMPORTANT SITE NOTE: I never got a lot of traffic on this site, however, to those that checked it out for the articles, I am going to have to apologize -- It occurred to me that blog posts aren't really a good fit for my personality.

So, instead, I have decided to move my site to something that better fits my own personality... I am going to just host dotfiles and configuration files. If there are any questions about them, I am available at all times at vstech@protonmail.ch

I got good feedback on the thumbnail/art section as well, so I'll leave that. Please let me know if there is anything else that stood out that should probably come back... I will probably be keeping this not up until the end of 2020.
